article: prime minister ariel sharon said in an interview published friday that he has no immediate plans to withdraw from any more jewish settlements after the current pullout from gaza and part of the west bank is complete , and that progress in peace making will depend on the palestinians .
abstract: israeli prime minister says no further withdrawals expected in near future
